XData.name: KPI
XData.Description: This XData definition defines the KPI.
XData.Data:
<kpi xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee/kpi" name="Training/DeepSee/Demos/HoleFoods KPI" sourceType="mdx" caption="" >
<property name="Units Sold" columnNo="1"/> <property name="Amount Sold" columnNo="2"/> <action name="Synchronize"/> <filter name="Region"/> </kpi>

Method.name: %OnLoadKPI
Method.Description: Notification that this KPI is being executed. This is a good place to override properties, such as range and threshold.

Method.name: %OnGetMDX
Method.Description: Return an MDX statement to execute.
Method.Implementation:
set pMDX = "SELECT {[Measures].[Units Sold], [Measures].[Amount Sold]} On 0,[Outlet].[H1].[All Outlet] On 1, FROM [HOLEFOODS] %FILTER [DateOfSale].[YearSold].&[NOW]"
If ..%filterValues.Region '= "" { Set region=..%filterValues.Region Set filter = " %FILTER [Outlet].[H1].[Region]."_region Set pMDX=pMDX_filter
}
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: %OnDashboardAction
Method.Description: This callback is invoked from a dashboard when an action defined by this dashboard is invoked.

Method.name: %OnGetFilterMembers
Method.Description:
Callback to get additional members for a KPI filter. This takes the form:
pMembers($I(pMembers))=$LB(text,value)
pSearchKey is the search key entered by the user, if applicable.
